name: FlexPHP News
short_description: FlexPHP News is a free php news management scripts. It gives you the most time-saving and cost-effective way to edit, publish and revise articles/news. It is specially designed for search engine optimization. It is SEO friendly and has several useful tools for the web marketing. It is the ultimate solution for webmaster's article publishing. Its features can be seen in search engine friendly URLs of URL rewriting and 301 redirect, article plagiarism checking, article keywords density checking, article Google indexing checking, etc.
summary: FlexPHP News--free php news management scripts designed for SEO
